title: Episode 286: Best N*t I Ever Had (Feat. Fatboy SSE & his wife, Tiana)
itunes:title: Episode 286: Best N*t I Ever Had (Feat. Fatboy SSE & his wife, Tiana)
description:
Fatboy SSE and his beautiful wife Tianato are here to promote Fatboy’s latest song ‘More Than Friends.’ Fatboy and Tiana share their love story about how they met, got married and had a kid all in a relatively short period of time. Fatboy opens up about the messiness with his previous relationship, and how Tiana has helped him grow and evolve into a better man, father, and entrepreneur. Fatboy speaks on the shadiness of his former friend sleeping with his ex, having the same passcode as his wife for each others phones, and much more. Tiana even calls him out for his awful gambling fiasco in Vegas on her birthday! Enjoy!

Having acne problems? Go to Apostrophe.com/ANGELA for $15 off your first visit with their certified dermatologists!
